text: Stavros S. Anthony (Greek: Σταύρος Αντωνίου) (born January 13, 1957) is an American politician and retired law enforcement officer. He is the Lieutenant Governor of Nevada since 2023. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was a Member of Las Vegas City Council from 2009 to 2023. He was appointed Mayor Pro Tem of Las Vegas by Mayor Carolyn Goodman. Anthony unsuccessfully ran for mayor in the 2015. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Nevada Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Las Vegas
title: Stavros Anthony
